Description: The probability to purchase any product with a new engagement
Sales pipeline stage (Prospecting > Engaging > Won / Lost)
Date in which the "Engaging" deal stage was initiated
Date in which the deal was "Won" or "Lost"
The point of contact at the company with whom we are engaging
The type of interaction (meeting or email), meetings could be in person or virtual
The status of the interaction, either completed or scheduled, note that these are manually adjusted. A scheduled meeting may still be completed but just hasn't been updated in the system.
Summary of the interaction, could also include the email that was sent
